<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 63 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

You heard the call of the sea from a young age. Perhaps you signed onto a merchant’s vessel, joined the navy, or even fell in with a crew of pirates and scalawags.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Dexterity, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill, and the [Sailing Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Underwater Marauder](/Feats.aspx?ID=858) skill feat.
